item.title: Mechanical Random Number Generator
item.description: Random numbers are extremely difficult to generate. This project focused on designing a mechanical random number generator (RNG) as well as statistically analysing both the degree of randomness and the ability to detect tampering. The webcam shown in the schematics was connected to my computer, running a program I wrote in C++ using the OpenCV library. Every 500 milliseconds, the colour of the highest, leftmost ball was recorded with empty frames disregarded.
